title: Handle Early Lease Termination Request
description: A tenant needs to break their lease due to a job relocation. The PM must handle the request according to the lease terms.

tasks.description: Retrieve the tenant's lease agreement and review the early termination clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the clause stating the tenant is responsible for rent until re-rented, plus a termination fee.

tasks.description: Communicate the lease-break policy and associated costs to the tenant in writing.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear email is sent to the tenant explaining their financial obligations.

tasks.description: Once the tenant agrees, generate an early lease termination agreement for them to sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legal agreement outlining the terms of the lease break is drafted and sent for signature.
